name: Cerys-Moon-of-Fulgora
title: Cerys
author: thesixthroc
description:
Fulgora's moon of puzzles and secrets. Ancient wrecks lodged under thick ice can seemingly be repaired, including a colossal Fulgoran reactor that could transform the possibilities on the surface... if you can manage to get it working.

Cerys is a complete and largely polished mod that does not affect the vanilla game, so is easy to include in existing saves.
